overview: Raymond D. Croghan is currently Managing Partner of Croghan Investments, LLC, an investment and consulting firm located in Longmont, Colorado. He is also a Director of Crocs, Inc. In 1980, Mr. Croghan joined a small high technology company called Applied Communications, Inc. (ACI) as a systems engineer. In 1987, he assumed the role of CEO and President of ACI. During his tenure, ACI grew to become the leading supplier of on-line Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT) software to the worldâ€™s largest financial institutions. Tandem Computers acquired ACI in 1991. He then started Croghan & Associates, Inc., with the mission to transfer the EFT technology used in financial networks to the health care industry. In 1997, Croghan & Associates merged with Margolis Health Enterprises to form The TriZetto Group, a company which provides outsourced information services for the business of healthcare. The TriZetto GroupSM completed a successful Initial Public Offering in1999. From 1999 to the present Mr. Croghan has been an investor and advisor with a number of early stage companies in Colorado. Mr. Croghan received a Bachelors Degree in Mathematics in 1972 from Doane College in Crete, Nebraska. He now serves on Doaneâ€™s Board of Trustees.
